verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. The king <S%H4428><s%> shall joy <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy strength <S%H5797><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; and in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> how greatly <S%H3966><s%> shall he rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%> !

Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him his heart's <S%H3820><s%> desire <S%H8378><s%>, and hast not withholden <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the request <S%H782><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

For thou preventest <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him with the b'rakhot <S%H1293><s%> of goodness <S%H2896><s%>: thou settest <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of pure gold <S%H6337><s%> on his head <S%H7218><s%>.

He asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> of thee, and thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it him, even length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
His glory <S%H3519><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>: honour <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> hast thou laid <S%H7737><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon him.

For thou hast made <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him most blessed <S%H1293><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: thou hast made <S%H2302><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him exceeding glad <S%H8057><s%> with thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>.

For the king <S%H4428><s%> trusteth <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and through the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> he shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Thine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall find out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall find out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> those that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.

Thou shalt make <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them as a fiery <S%H784><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of thine anger <S%H6440><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, and the fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.
Their fruit <S%H6529><s%> shalt thou destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8762><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, and their seed <S%H2233><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.

For they intended <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against thee: they imagined <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a mischievous device <S%H4209><s%>, which they are not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to perform.

Therefore shalt thou make <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them turn their back <S%H7926><s%>, when thou shalt make ready <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8787><s%> thine arrows upon thy strings <S%H4340><s%> against the face <S%H6440><s%> of them.

Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%>, in thine own strength <S%H5797><s%>: so will we sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and praise <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy power <S%H1369><s%>.
